name: 浪客：佣兵传说.
abstract: 就是现在！高举你的酒盏！和我们一起踏上一段杀伐之旅，跃迁于八段惊心历史，享受其中的磅礴、财富和传奇壮举！

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
A Tale of 100 Deeds - Patch 1.1.1 Notes:

• Players can now select 3 different difficulty levels:

Easy - Enjoyable experience for new players, allowing them to focus on the story and become proficient in sword fighting
Medium - A balanced challenge for those who have some VR experience
Hard - A tough challenge for sword-fighting veterans. Reduced health regeneration, more aggressive and skilled opponents, or higher damage received are just to begin with!

• A Mystical Boomerang power-up has been added to the game. After being hit by the Mystical Boomerang, the enemies will drop another power-up

• Opponents who are not involved in combat now perform new taunt animations. Don't let them provoke you!

• The whole combat-style in the Alcazaba level is now revamped. Al Mansur now holds his weapons in a reverse grip... pretty skilled for a diplomat!
